title: What are the Rolling Stones' best ballads? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some that come to mind. “As Tears Go By”, “Angie”, “Out of Tears”, “Almost Hear You Sigh”, “Worried About You” (a deep cut from Tattoo You), “Beast of Burden”, “Moonlight Mile”. The Stones are a hard rock band, but they can and do record some great ballads.
My wife swears up and down it’s, “Wild Horses” from their Sticky Fingers album (my personal favorite, by the way). Anyway, I’d be hard-pressed to disagree with her…
